message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value. I'm extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $200. This price is exclusive and tailored to appreciate your interest early on. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on your product. However, my budget allows me to spend no more than $150 on this purchase. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the quality and uniqueness of our product, I am willing to negotiate at a price of $175. I believe this strikes a fair balance between respecting your budget constraints and compensating for the value we place on our product. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and while I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must respectfully decline. My maximum budget remains at $150. I hope this helps guide us towards a mutually agreeable solution.
